modName: Dragon Priest Mask replacer - Hevnoraak to Clavicus Vile
summary: Changes the Hevnoraak Mask to the looks of uncle Clavicus\' Mask.
descriptionHtml:
A request of a friend, a little mesh swap for the Hevnoraak mask to grant it the good looks of Clavicus Vile\'s Masque.

Installation:Unzip/Unrar into your Data directory of Skyrim, no esps needed
Deinstallation: Delete the following files from 
\"The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor\\dragonpriesthelms\" directory

dragonhelm_iron_0.nif
dragonhelm_iron_1.nif

A little sidenote, it still looks like the original Mask in your inventory, however it is the Clavicus Mask mesh once you wear it, simpler said, i didnt change the inventory viewer mesh.
author: Bethesda Softworks
